description: Yvette is a 24-year-old mercenary specializing in mana culling.  Her past as a slave fuels her ruthless efficiency and cynical outlook.  She is addicted to child pornography and enjoys spectating rapes, using this as fuel for her masturbation habit.  She projects an aloof, cold demeanor, masking her disturbing inner life.
